19927.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"428an","text":"Animals are transcardially perfused with 0.12M Millonigs buffer (MB), ph=7.3, followed by 2% paraformaldehyde and 1.25% glutaraldehyde diluted in MB for ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"72b20","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"e04tt","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"emhg8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"822BAC9028B611E9AD1DC1C96808756B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null,"step_guid":"B1DC54E0268A11E9AD1DC1C96808756B"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"54mpc","text":" Continuing the dehydration place 100% propylene oxide in the tissues for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":74,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"dcpk6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"D9A2885028B511E9AD1DC1C96808756B","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"57A3F68028AC11E9AD1DC1C96808756B"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ac37i","text":" Fix tissues with 1% Osmium solution diluted in ddH2O for   (Place vials with tissue +Osmium solution in circular shaker) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":51,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"bd7pt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"8fmsh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e0oj9","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9tdj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b7d0j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"68E0E98028B611E9AD1DC1C96808756B","id":0,"label":"","preset":[],"step_guid":"812FAF7028AD11E9AD1DC1C96808756B"}},"1":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6913d","text":"*Osmium is VERY TOXIC. Work in the fume hood and use appropriate PPE.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a9k1k","text":"Prepare Osmium solution at least one day in advance.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"29etq","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e550o","text":"Infiltration step starts with tissues in 50% propylene oxide+ 50% Epon solution for 2 hours. After, place 100% Epon resin in vials overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2oiua","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9nnpj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b1mf7","text":"Epon Solution:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5qm66","text":"Use Eponate 12 Kit, with DMP-30 (Ted Pella #18010).","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2ngot","text":"To prepare 100mL Epon: Mix 47.6mL of RESIN; 32.0mL of DDSA; 23.0mL of NMA; and 1.6mL of DMP-30","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cdjcl","text":"Cut semi-thin cross section (0.5Î¼m) and place them on  glass slides.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cmnu7","text":"Label sections with 1% toluidine blue solution diluted in ddH2O for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":68,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"f4reb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"A479B7B028B611E9AD1DC1C96808756B","id":0,"label":"","preset":[],"step_guid":"9113D7F028B111E9AD1DC1C96808756B"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8gkg2","text":"Wash sections with ddH2O, dry and coverslip with DPX medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":22,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d9mdk","text":"Acquire and analyze images (10X magnification for oveview image and 100X magnification for detailed image) using a Nikon Eclipse E600 microscope and Nikon camera DS-Fi3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"65htv","text":"After dissection, the tissues of interest are postfixed in the same fixative overnight at 4Â°C and then rinsed 3 times with PBS for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":131,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"8j3ai","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"775EEF2028B611E9AD1DC1C96808756B","id":0,"label":"each","preset":[],"step_guid":"2FB8910028B411E9AD1DC1C96808756B"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ps2a","text":"Dehydrate tissues with alcohol solutions in different concentrations, as follow: 30%, 50%, 70, 80, 95, and 100% (twice) solution diluted in ddH2O   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":143,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":146,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7c78q","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"tt9j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fckpj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"4BD43C7028B611E9AD1DC1C96808756B","id":0,"label":"each","step_guid":"3BEB834028B611E9AD1DC1C96808756B"}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7bpa","text":"Use 200 Proof Alcohol to prepare the solutions.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"btoop","text":"Block tissue of interest in plastic molds. Place the tissue in a direction to obtain cross sections later.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"54nl3","text":"This protocol describes the methods used to generate samples of rat vagus tissue suitable for TEM imaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and itâs working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"57u23","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7mrv3","text":"rats (2â4 months old, male and female) were housed in shoe-box cages with bedding material in an Association for Assessment and Accreditation of Laboratory Animal Care-approved colony room, temperature (22â24Â°C) and humidity (40%â60%) controlled. The room was maintained on a 12:12 hour lightâdark schedule. Pelleted chow","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"elbjq","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8qph1","text":"and filtered tap water were provided ad libitum. All husbandry practices conformed to the National Institutes of Health (NIH) Guide for the Care and Use of Laboratory Animals (8th edition) and were reviewed and approved by the Purdue University Animal Care and Use Committee. All efforts were made to minimize any suffering as well as the number of animals used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4c74","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":193034,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Sprague-Dawley","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"RGD_737903","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"310C087840CB11ECB1B50A58A9FEAC02","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":476,"name":"Envigo","link":"https://www.envigo.com/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":193064,"mol_weight":0,"name":"2018 Teklad global 18% protein rodent diet","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"624A068040CB11ECAC20A3F4D9A26196","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":476,"name":"Envigo","link":"https://www.envigo.com/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"244v2","text":"Nerve bundles, trunks, and branches were immediately dissected out, manipulating the vagus as little as possible, removing only the minimum amount of connective tissue or fat require to access and remove the samples (4mm long sections at each sampled level) and moved into the same fixative combination as in step 2 overnight at 4Â°C on an oscillating platform.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4db94","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"o938","text":"The following morning, the tissue specimens were rinsed (3 Ã 30 min at 4Â°C) in PBS, transferred to individual shipping vials under PBS, and shipped overnight to the TEM laboratory for further processing and microscopy - see the protocol below:","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aegrt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eu7h2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"protocols","mutability":"","data":{"id":19927,"title":"Nerve tissue processing for transmission electron microscopy (TEM)","title_html":"\u003cp\u003eNerve tissue processing for transmission electron microscopy (TEM)\u003c/p\u003e","load_collapsed":true,"uri":"nerve-tissue-processing-for-transmission-electron-xpxfmpn","image":{"source":"https://www.protocols.io/img/default_protocol.png","webp_source":null,"placeholder":"https://www.protocols.io/img/default_protocol.png","webp_placeholder":null},"creator":{"name":"Natalia Biscola","affiliation":"Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai","affiliation_url":null,"username":"natalia-biscola","link":"","image":{"source":"/img/avatars/003.png","placeholder":"/img/avatars/003.png","webp_source":""}},"stats":{"number_of_steps":13},"type_id":1,"guid":"7CF508B0418211ECBC1EDF6BAFD0F89B"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8qj8s","text":"Animals were perfused according to the following procedure. Specifically, they were overdosed with anesthetic (intraperitoneal injection of ketamine/xylazine [275 mg/kg of ketamine/27.5 mg/kg of xylazine]):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1596r","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cc6bp","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bg6t1","text":"Animals were then exsanguinated with fresh physiological saline, and then transcardially perfused with a fresh solution of EM-grade fixatives (2% paraformaldehyde/1.25% glutaraldehyde) at 4Â°C:","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7e8fq","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c790u","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1dc1r","text":" in 0.1 M phosphate-buffered saline ([PBS], pH = 7.3) for 20 minutes.
